answers: We serve the NYC area and nearby regions. Travel fees may apply outside city limits.

questions: Do you need power or water onsite?
answers: A standard 120V outlet is preferred. We don’t require onsite water for espresso service.

questions: How far in advance should I book?
answers: For weekends/weddings, we recommend 4–8 weeks. Weekdays can be sooner.
Yes! We can tailor syrups, milk options, and signature drinks to your event.
